/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A white car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the everyday life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of natural beauty and urban development.
